mapper.select: select name as "name", student_id as "studentId", email as "email", birth as "birth", position as "position" from student

select student.student_id as "studentId", name as "name", support_yn as "supportYn", common_code.comn_cd_title as "comnCdTitle" from student left join enroll on enroll.student_id = student.student_id left join subject on subject.subject_id = enroll.subject_id left join common_code on common_code.comn_cd = enroll.state_cd where support_yn = 'Y'
